original_title: The Story of the Other Wise Man
overview: Based on a story by Henry Van Dyke. After years of searching, a fourth Wise Man finds Jesus Christ, but he has no gifts left to give Him. He is comforted to learn that "inasmuch as ye have done it unto the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me" (Matthew 25:40)

production_companies.name: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

title: The Story of the Other Wise Man
